title: This assignment tests you on how to create string object and perform in build operations on strings objects.

questionText.text:
Write a program to return roll number, name and email using concat().
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed.

title: This assignment tests you on how to create string object and perform in build operations on strings objects like reverse a string, check for the length, etc.

questionText.text:
Given a String, Return true if the given String is palindrome, return false otherwise. A String is said to be palindrome, it is same if it is read in both the directions.
isPalindrome(“Hello”) → false
isPalindrome(“madam”) → true
isPalindrome(“Good Morning”) → false
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed

title: This assignment tests you on how to create string object and convert string objects to different data types like Integer, float,etc.

questionText.text:
Given an String, Write a java method that returns the decimal value for the given binary string.
binaryToDecimal(“1010”) → 10
binaryToDecimal(“10000000000”) → 1024
binaryToDecimal(“111111111111111”) → 32767
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed

title: Finally, This activity teaches you on how to create string object and perform the build in operations on strings.

questionText.text:
Given a string, return a "rotated right 2" version where the last 2 chars are moved to the start. The string length will be at least 2.
right2("Hello") → loHel
right2("java") → vaja
right2("Hi") → Hi
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
